title: Weekly Review with Clay and Buck H3 - May 7 2022
itunes:title: Weekly Review with Clay and Buck H3 - May 7 2022
description:
NY Times writes about new research showing the high costs of long school closures, which we all knew at the time. Buck says, "The benefit of doing this was zero." Suburban moms must punish Democrats for closing schools. Clay says, "The suburban mom community in particular, you guys need to be talking. You need to be grabbing some of these clips from this show." Enthusiasm gap: GOP turnout (up 13% since 2018) trounced Dems in Ohio primary. Biden trashes "MAGA crowd" as most extreme in American history. We've said it before and we'll say it again: Fired-up female voters can make the difference. Stock market down. Buck asks Clay how he's doing: Will he need to do this show six hours a day?

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
